verses.roman:
advaita avadhūta kichu kahe prabhu-pāya
"sahaje tomāra guṇe jagat vikāya

synonyms: advaita—Advaita Prabhu; avadhūta—Nityānanda Prabhu; kichu—something; kahe—said; prabhu-pāya—at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sahaje—naturally; tomāra—Your; guṇe—because of transcendental attributes; jagat vikāya—the whole world is obligated to You.
translation: Advaita Prabhu and Lord Nityānanda Prabhu submitted these words at the lotus feet of the Lord: "The entire world is naturally obligated to You for Your transcendental attributes.
